column1: Deli Tua is a town and administrative district within Deli Serdang Regency of North Sumatra province of Indonesia. It covers an area of 9.36 km2
column3: 624 at the 2010 Census. It lies immediately south of Medan city
column4: of which it is effectively a suburb. The district comprises six administrative "villages"
